A world where dreams are physical objects that can be collected and traded like commodities.
A planet where dreams are manifested in the form of art, and artists are revered as dream weavers.
A world where dreams are communalinalities, and people can share and merge their dreams to create new ones.
A planet where dreams are created through a process of dream alchemy, where dreams are combined with physical objects to create powerful artifacts.
A world where dreams are harnessed as a source of energy, and those who can harness their dreams are seen as powerful sorcerers.
